word: This was followed, not long afterward, by the public burning of the Bible. And \93the popular society of the museum entered the hall of the municipality, exclaiming, Vive la Raison! and carrying on the top of a pole the half-burned remains of several books, among others the breviaries of the Old and New Testaments, which \91expiated in a great fire,\92 said the president, \91all the fooleries which they have made the human race commit.\92\94
